title: TimeValidator
description: A validator specifying the constraints on a time.

type.$comment: This is a special property analogous to JSON-LD's `@type` keyword.

id.$comment: This is a special property analogous to JSON-LD's `@id` keyword.

minimum.description: The inclusive lower limit for a time.
minimum.$comment: A time is valid if it is greater than, or exactly equal to, `minimum`.

maximum.description: The inclusive upper limit for a time.
maximum.$comment: A time is valid if it is less than, or exactly equal to, `maximum`.
